subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: As of mid-August, baseball’s investigators looking into the use of performance-enhancing drugs still wanted to speak with at least 45 current and former major league players, most of them still active.
snippet: As of mid-August, baseball’s investigators looking into the use of performance-enhancing drugs still wanted to speak with at least 45 current and former major league players, most of them still active.
